verbs.description: [ARG1: red sox] [V: are] [ARG2: all business] [ARGM-LOC: in world series] [ARGM-LOC: somewhere in a back room of the capital grille on boylston street in boston] the red sox regular season is sitting in a box waiting to be opened up again so all the good memories can be poured out but for now it sits put aside until the world series is over when the sox finished off their 108-win season last month manager alex cora gathered his players for a private dinner the next day it was his way of ending one season and houston astros dodgers dave roberts los angeles dodgers alex cora astros rick porcello red sox boston red sox dodger stadium world series
